workspace.name: MLW1-configure&basics
workspace.query: xquery version "1.0-ml"; import module namespace temporal = "http://marklogic.com/xdmp/temporal" at "/MarkLogic/temporal.xqy"; (:Create temporal axis myValid and mySystem expect empty sequence as result:) temporal:axis-create( "myValid", cts:element-reference(xs:QName("valStart")), cts:element-reference(xs:QName("valEnd"))), temporal:axis-create( "mySystem", cts:element-reference(xs:QName("sysStart")), cts:element-reference(xs:QName("sysEnd")));

(: collection is a way to group documents together uniquely identified by a string one document can be in any number of collections return empty string means document is ingested
temporal collection is different, TODO - try putting a temporal collection in the collection setting :)
xdmp:document-insert( "foo.xml", (: URI :) <foo>bar</foo>, (: content :) xdmp:default-permissions(), (: permission setting :) ("collection1","col2"), (: collection setting :) 10 )

(: Two ways of seeing a document: 1. Use fn.doc() function 2. Click "Explore" button and navigate :)
fn:doc("foo.xml")
